t: Amazon Polly's Brand Voice taps AI to generate custom spokespeople | VentureBeat
s: February 5, 2020 - The Seattle tech giant today launched Brand Voice, a fully managed service within Amazon Polly, Amazon’s cloud service that converts text into lifelike speech, that pairs customers with Amazon engineers to build AI-generated voices representing certain personas.

t: Amazon’s ‘Polly Brand Voice’ heralds a new era of accessibility, but there's still a way to go | The Drum
s: February 25, 2020 - Amazon Polly is a text-to-speech (TTS) service which allows you to create speech from text to be used in your Alexa Skill, website or app.

t: Amazon’s ‘Brand Voice’ Feature Lets Brands Build Custom Text-To-Speech Voices For Alexa - Tech
s: February 6, 2020 - It supports a range of lifelike voices and languages, helping you select the ideal voice for your application. Moreover, Amazon Polly also provides Neural Text-to-Speech Voices (NTTS) that helps improve the overall speech quality for more natural human voices.

Amazon Polly is a service that turns text into lifelike speech, and offers over 60 publicly available voices in 29 languages. AWS is excited to announce a new feature in Amazon Polly called Brand Voice, a feature where customers can engage the Amazon Polly team to build custom high-quality ...

t: AWS brings tailored personas to Amazon Polly with Brand Voice | ZDNET
s: February 4, 2020 - Amazon Web Services (AWS) has introduced Brand Voice as the latest feature to the company's Amazon Polly service, which it touts will enable companies to use neural text-to-speech technology to tailor voice to suit their brand's persona.
